00022 /*
00023     TODO: allow request for the source to be randomized, or for 2D distribution
00024            of hypergraph.
00025 
00026     TODO: allow app to specify that not all info for source is needed.  So if graph
00027         vertices have coordinates, but we won't be using them, the source won't
00028         read them in.
00029 
00030     TODO: use Teuchos Array RCPs for persistent objects - views of our data that we
00031            supply to the caller
00032 
00033     TODO: This class does not support Zoltan1's global ID as is an arbitrary number
00034             of integers unless someone writes a class to represent that and
00035             uses it as the AppGID
00036 
00037     Weights are not inherent in the source.  They are part of the objective function.
00038     Same goes for number of parts and part sizes.  Fixed vertices are part of the
00039     constraints.  The ObjectSource is just the source, not the problem to be solved.
00040 
00041  ObjectSource traits:
00042     has_matrix()
00043     has_dense_matrix()
00044     has_csr_matrix()
00045     has_csc_matrix()
00046     has_graph()
00047     has_vertices()
00048     has_vertex_coordinates()
00049     coordinate_dimension()                 , etc.
00050 
00051  ObjectSource methods:
00052     get_number_of_vertices(),etc.  All methods to get local and global counts
00053     get_vertices()                 All methods to get local objects
00054     gid_to_gno()        All methods to convert back and forth between app GIDs 
00055     gid_to_lid()         and internal consecutive GNOs and LIDs
00056 */
00057 
00058 class Tpetra::MultiVector;

00213 template<typename Scalar, typename LNO , typename GNO, typename AppGID>
00214   class ExodusFileSource : public ObjectSource <Scalar, LNO, GNO, AppGID>{
00215 
00216 private:
00217 
00218   std::string file_name;
00219   int dimension;
00220 
00221 public:
00222 
00224   ExodusFileSource():file_name("unset"){}
00225 
00231   ExodusFileSource(std::string &fileName){file_name = string(fileName);}
00232 
00234   ~ExodusFileSource(){}
00235 
00237   ExodusFileSource(const ExodusFileSource &efs){
00238     this->file_name(efs.get_file_name());
00239   }
00240 
00242   ExodusFileSource &operator=(const ExodusFileSource &efs){
00243     if (this == &efs) return *this;
00244 
00245     ObjectSource *me = this;    // call base class operator
00246     ObjectSource *you = &efs;
00247     *me = *you
00248 
00249     file_name(efs.get_file_name());
00250     return *this;
00251   }
